message: Nmap + NSE scripts (modbus-discover, enip-info, s7-info) form the most robust, automatable cross-vendor discovery stack; combine with masscan/zmap for fast port discovery and tshark for packet-level validation/export.

validation: tshark -i <iface> -Y modbus -T fields -e ip.src -e ip.dst -e modbus.func_code
data.apipa_hint: Specify interface with -e and scan 169.254.0.0/16; disable host discovery (-Pn).
